channel.title: Making an item owner only

item.title: Making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:2, topic:339399”]See this,

(playerRights != 3)

I will let you fix one, But here are what two very important operators mean.

!= - Check to see if the expression/variable DOESNT equal to. In this case, it is evaluating that plaerRights doesnt equal 3.

== - This does the opposite. This checks to see if an expression/variable EQUALS to something. If you changed it to this operator, what would happen?

Take a look at this eventually,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It would make it so anyone who’s player rights isn’t 3 can’t use it (im guessing). Also, what about if I do (playerRights <= 3)

EDIT: oohhhh i get it now since i went to that page u linked to! Thanks alot man, Rep!

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

Here’s the code: if(wearID == 8002 && (playerRights != 3)) { sendMessage("you need to be an Owner to wear this"); return; }

I’m using czar base. I put it under like if (wearID == 8447) { // cat toy playerSER = 1661; playerSEW = 1660; }
should I put the code somewhere else or fix the code? If fix the code, please tell me where. I wanna make it so only owners (rights = 3) can wield it. Thanks
